name: Let's Aim! Shooting Gallery
description:
Let's enjoy playing a shooting gallery on the Nintendo Switch™!
Share Joy-Con™ and play with up to 4 players!
Aim for a new high score!

Fix your aim and win all sorts of prizes!

[Score Attack]
Knock down lots of prizes and aim for a high ranking on the leaderboards!

[Battle]
Face off against CPUs in single-player mode, or test your skills against friends in multiplayer battles!
Challenge shooting gallery players from all over the world in online battles!
intro:
Gear up for a carnival game classic: shooting gallery!
Hit as many targets as you can and become a shooting gallery master!
